name: moodiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of changing your moods suddenly and becoming angry or unhappy easily: It's just normal teenage moodiness. She suffered from moodiness and fatigue.
a mysterious or slightly sad quality: His photography captures the moodiness of the landscape. The song has a dark moodiness. See
moody
